query:
select
                id as "id!: ProductId",
                json(app_data) as "app_data!: sqlx::types::Json<ProductData>",
                case
                    when
                        parent_id is null
                    then
                        null
                    else
                        json_array(parent_id, parent_ratio)
                    end as "parent?: sqlx::types::Json<(ProductId, f64)>",
                null as "basis?: sqlx::types::Json<Basis<ProductId>>"
            from
                product
            where
                id = $1
